pageContext.claim: “I literally have a foundation where I took in X dollars and I gave more money than I took in and they sued me. It's the most unbelievable thing. In other words, I had no expenses. No rent, no management, no nothing, and they sued me. It's a political lawsuit.”
pageContext.analysis: New York's attorney general said, "The Trump Foundation was little more than a checkbook for payments from Mr. Trump or his businesses to nonprofits, regardless of their purpose or legality." Trump has never followed through on numerous charitable donations he claims to have made.
